participants.name: Diane Weaver
participants.description: Works at Sterling Research Group, LTD.

messages.message:
Brian
Thank you for the Christmas card!
Yes, I do have three jobs--hospice nurse, coordinator of senior adult ministry, and wedding liaison.

Brian
That's impressive!  Ela works at a senior living home.  Do you find joy in all of them?

I do find joy in all of them.  It is an honor to help a person move from this life to the next and be a support to their family and significant others.  I love being with senior adults because they are wise and kind.  I learn so much from them.  And it is so much fun to work with young couples as they are beginning their lives together and the joy they exude.  It took me a long time to get here and I had many jobs I didn't like, stressed about.  My prayer for you is you find your joy and that you gave patience to live into it.  Love you!

Brian
Good advice.  I love you too!  Thank you for that prayer.

Brian
Did Dave or your parents beat you growing up?
